plot: Its high school graduation, and like all seniors they want to party. So 500 high school seniors look forward to a party, while in the meantime a boy wants to get a girl he's loved for years that just broke up with her boyfriend and one head-case that wants revenge on a lifelong bully. So the party comes, things develop. People have sex, drink, and go along with most of the guidelines of a high school graduation party.

m.role: Mike went to college on a football scholarship... which he lost after his drinking got in the way of his performance. He then turned into a Jaded Washout, overweight and getting fired from his job at the car wash after some photos from the party surfaced.
Jerk Jock: Mike, on his way to becoming a Jaded Washout.

f.role: Hooker with a Heart of Gold: The angel stripper Preston encounters while trying to use a payphone.

name: Can't Hardly Wait
